name: The Mission
overview: In 2467, humans built a space station over the planet Karakal. It became a popular meeting place for people and aliens seeking business opportunities, which made the human colony rich and prosperous. A group of aliens tried to take control of the space station. Military managed to get them off the ship, but not before they managed to sabotage the station. Your mission is to save the space station before its reactor will blow up, causing a rain of radioactive fall will drop to the colony.
